testcase.name: Successful Login With Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://katalon-demo-cura.herokuapp.com/"..............passed And click on "Make Appointment".............................................passed And user enters Username as "John Doe" and Password as "ThisIsNotAPassword".passed And click on login..........................................................passed Then page title Should be "CURA Healthcare Service".........................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
